answers.answer: Welcome to the Forum.  I'll try to help, first by discussing your risks and secondly by helping to evaluate your test results.  As far as your risks are concerned, as I understand it, both of your partners were commercial sex workers.  Fortunately, most commercial sex workers, particularly in Bahrain, do not have HIV.  You received oral sex with your first partner, then performed rectal sex with him.  With the second partner your exposure was again rectal intercourse.  In all instances condoms were not used.   As I said, most commercial sex workers do not have HIV so your risk for HIV is rather low to start with.  There is no risk for HIV form oral sex- no one has ever convincingly described a case in which HIV was transmitted by oral sex.  On the other hand, rectal intercourse is rather high risk, IF your partner has HIV with the risk for infection being about 1 infection for every 100-200 acts of intercourse.Your test results make it unlikely you got infected.   The most important results are those form your second set of tests.  At any time more than 4 weeks following exposure, a  negative HIV combo assay like you had, provides definitive evidence that you did not get infected and would detect about 90% of recently acquired infections.  Your PCR and other test results only serve to conform the results of the combo HIV antigen/antibody test that you had.  This it is most unlikely that you acquired HIV from either of these exposures.In the future however, please use condoms.  EWH

Thanks for your response doctorThe first exposure can be considered with a commercial sex workerThe second i don't think so as she is a citizen where rules on foriegners don't apply on her (like routine testing)From the results of the tests are any of the exposures concludedPlus i am planing to take another combo tomorrow which will be 28 days after second exposure and about seven weeks from first exposure. Is the result of this conclude my situation.Thanks again doctor

I would consider your second contact a CSW as well. If she supports hereself with sex, she is a CSW.After your 2nd test tomorrow, 28 days since your exposure to the 2nd partner, you can be confident that you did not get HIV from either partner. EWH

Hi again doctorThe result of the i did today came back negative.My infectouse disease doctor says i need to retest after one month.Do i need any more testing or the last tesr conclude my situation.Thanks

At this time there is very, very little chance that you acquired HIV from the exposures you described.  At this time, test reuslts are not 100% accurate however your exposures were low risk and as a result I would not worry.   If you decide to re-test, I am confident the result will be negative. EWH
So when is the time to retest and using what kind of testAnd what is the accuracy percentage of all of my tests so far for each exposureThanks dr

A negative combined HIV p24 antigen/HIV antibody test (aslo called a "combo" or "DUO" test will be definitive at 4 weeks following exposure.  Alternatively, a standard HIV antibody only test will provide definitive results at 8 weeks.  EWH

Last question drDoes diabetes or cancer affect the accuracy of the combo testI am from a family that are well known of having diabetes plus i have an enlarged node in my neck that i have done an ultrasound and they are saying it is most probably a lipoma
No, neither diabetes, nor cancer, nor for that matter, a family history of diabetes alter the reliablity of HIV test results.  EWH
Doctor i have some rash on my backDoes this mean i am serocoverting ( 6 weeks from second exposure )I have no fever no sore throat

Good day doctor.I went to a skin doctor and i have tested for herpes and hiv (elisa)I have recieved the hiv test which was negativeI didn't recieve herpes result as it will take four more daysMy question isDoes the hiv test indicate that the rash is not caused by hiv infection.I would realy appreciate your response
Last answer. Yes, that your ELISA test was negative when you had the rash is strong evidence that your rash was not due to HIV.there will be no further answers.  EWH
Sorry for the trouble and thank you very much doctor

question: Good day doctor,I had the following situation and i would really appreciate your prompt response,i had two unprotected exposure and i will describe it franklyFirst exposure was on 8th of june i was drunk and i had a massage on Bahrain (gulf country). The massage guy was a gay phlipino or Thai (i don't exactly know). he invited me to have sex and started to give me oral and then i had penetration (anal) that was very short and as i can remember i ejaculated outside. Last week i passed by the shop and i saw a health certificate (which i thinke by the country rule include HIV tests) and he was fine but that certificate was on 2010 december which is about six month before my contact with him.The second contact was on 28th of june (same month) it was with a Bahraini girl (i met in a bar) that seem to be taking sex as an income (sex worker) as she asked me for money after the sex. She looks that she never carries condom with her (she was not carrying any when i asked her)  and always do the anal sex as i might noticed her backside whole (sorry) and as she claimed that she is still virgin.TWO DAYS AFTER THE SECOND EXPOSURE I HAD GRAIN OR SOMETHING LIKE PILL YOUTH (only one) ON MY PENIS. WHICH THE INFECTUOUS DISEASE DOCTOR SAYS DON'T WARRY ABOUT ITnow i had the following test on the 7th of july 4 weeks after first exposure and 9th day after second exposure:-- Antibody test on the 7th July came back negative.on 11 July 33 days after first exposure and 13 day after second exposure i had the following test:--C-Reactive protein -doctors says it is normal-- hepatitis c antibody - negative--hepatitis b antibody - negative-- syphilis test; qualitative (VDRL, RPR, ART ) NEGATIVE-- combo ag ab hiv - negative-- Qualitative RNA by PCR - negative.what is my situation now and what tests do i need to conclude my situation. i am in a very bad situation i can't sleep and i can't work i am 27 years old.Thanks,
title: How accurate my result would be
